short_summary: Construct a pre-fabricated living quarters in Little Grand Rapids, MB
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP)?    Title: Living Quarters Site Set Up Project - Little Grand Rapids, MB Solicitation Number: M5000-24-4548/A?    Description: Work includes the preparation of the site, including the construction of structural foundations, underground site services and associated mechanical, plumbing and electrical work required for the transport, placement and installation of a prefabricated living quarters building as described on drawings and specification in Little Grand Rapids, MB. Work related to fabrication, transport and physical placement of the prefabricated living quarters building is not under contract and must be completed by others. Contractor under this work is to prepare the site prior to transport and installation of building on site.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title**: Living Quarters Site Set Up Project - Little Grand Rapids, MB

**Solicitation Number**: M5000-24-4548/A

**Procurement Category**: Contractor

**Notice Status**: Open

**Publication Date**: November 19, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**: December 4, 2024, at 4:00 PM CT

**Purpose**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the Living Quarters Site Set Up Project in Little Grand Rapids, Manitoba. The project involves site preparation, construction of structural foundations, underground services, and associated mechanical, plumbing, and electrical work for a prefabricated living quarters building.

**Scope of Work**

The scope of work includes site preparation, including the construction of structural foundations, underground services, and associated mechanical, plumbing, and electrical work required for the transport, placement, and installation of a prefabricated living quarters building. The contractor must prepare the site as specified in the contract documents prior to the transport and installation of the building. The contractor must also connect the building services after the building has been delivered to the site and placed on the new structural foundation.

**RFP Instructions**

The Request for Qualification (RFQ) will be used to pre-qualify bidders based on mandatory requirements. The list of pre-qualified bidders will be valid for a period of 60 days. The selected contractor must complete the work by March 31, 2026.

**Security Requirements**

This project is subject to security requirements. Refer to the attached tender documents for further information.

**Eligible Companies**

The tender is open to all qualified contractors who meet the mandatory requirements specified in the RFQ.

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact Sandra Robinson, Procurement Officer, at (780) 670-8626 or sandra.robinson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

**Submission Information**

Proposal submissions must be made through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

**Important**

The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. The successful contractor must comply with the applicable provisions.
